lib/game/GameEngine.ts.description: Core game engine with complete implementation: snowflake spawning, snowball shooting, collision detection, scoring system, snow pile mechanic for lose condition, and difficulty scaling over time

lib/audio/AudioManager.ts.description: Web Audio API-based audio system with fire ambience loop and sound effects (throw, hit, accumulate, gameOver). Includes mute toggle and volume control based on snow pile height

app/api/leaderboard/route.ts.description: In-memory leaderboard API with GET (top 10 scores) and POST (score submission with validation). Pre-populated with sample data for development
